body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions          The South Carolina National Heritage Corridor (SCNHC) stretches 17 counties and 320 miles across South Carolina. The SCNHC is committed to promoting and preserving the cultural, natural, and historic resources of the state. More information regarding destinations within the corridor and their locations can be found here.
title: South Carolina National Heritage Corridor: Directions & Transportation
